marketplaces.name: block-marketplace
marketplaces.description: Directory protection tools for Claude Code

files.README.md:
# Block marketplace

A Claude Code plugin marketplace for directory protection tools.

## Installation

1. Add the marketplace:
   ```
   /plugin marketplace add kodroi/block-marketplace
   ```

2. Install the plugin:
   ```
   /plugin install block@block-marketplace
   ```

## Available Plugins

- **block** - File and directory protection using `.block` configuration files

plugins.name: block
plugins.description: File and directory protection using .block configuration files
